Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Agent/Monoclonal Antibody/Human MOAB LICO 28a32
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A human monoclonal immunoglobulin M (IgM) antibody with potential antineoplastic activity. Human MOAB LICO 28a32 binds to the colon tumor-associated antigen 28A32 (CTAA 28A32) found on the cell surface and in the cytoplasm of colon carcinoma cells. (NCI04)
